/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«exprΦ( , )» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `witt_vector.fraction_ring -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«exprΦ( , )» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«exprΦ( , )» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `witt_vector.frobenius_ring_hom -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `witt_vector.fraction_ring -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `witt_vector.fraction_ring -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≃ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `witt_vector.fraction_ring -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `witt_vector.fraction_ring -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `witt_vector.fraction_ring -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `witt_vector.frobenius_ring_hom -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `witt_vector.fraction_ring -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `isocrystal_equiv -/
/-- A one-dimensional isocrystal over an algebraically closed field
admits an isomorphism to one of the standard (indexed by `m : ℤ`) one-dimensional isocrystals. -/
theorem isocrystal_classification (k : Type _) [Field k] [is_alg_closed k] [char_p k p] (V : Type _) [add_comm_group V]
    [isocrystal p k V] (h_dim : finrank (witt_vector.fraction_ring p k) V = 1) :
    ∃ m : ℤ, nonempty (isocrystal_equiv (standard_one_dim_isocrystal p k m) p k V) :=
  by
  haveI : nontrivial V := finite_dimensional.nontrivial_of_finrank_eq_succ h_dim
  obtain ⟨x, hx⟩ : ∃ x : V, x ≠ 0 := exists_ne 0
  have : («exprΦ( , )» p k) x ≠ 0 := by simpa only [map_zero] using («exprΦ( , )» p k).injective.ne hx
  obtain ⟨a, ha, hax⟩ : ∃ a : witt_vector.fraction_ring p k, a ≠ 0 ∧ («exprΦ( , )» p k) x = «expr • » a x :=
    by
    rw [finrank_eq_one_iff_of_nonzero' x hx] at h_dim
    obtain ⟨a, ha⟩ := h_dim ((«exprΦ( , )» p k) x)
    refine' ⟨a, _, ha.symm⟩
    intro ha'
    apply this
    simp only [← ha, ha', zero_smul]
  obtain ⟨b, hb, m, hmb⟩ := witt_vector.exists_frobenius_solution_fraction_ring p ha
  replace hmb : (witt_vector.frobenius_ring_hom p k) b * a = p ^ m * b := by convert hmb
  use m
  let F₀ : «expr →ₗ[ ] » (standard_one_dim_isocrystal p k m) (witt_vector.fraction_ring p k) V :=
    linear_map.to_span_singleton (witt_vector.fraction_ring p k) V x
  let F : «expr ≃ₗ[ ] » (standard_one_dim_isocrystal p k m) (witt_vector.fraction_ring p k) V :=
    by
    refine' linear_equiv.of_bijective F₀ ⟨_, _⟩
    · rw [← linear_map.ker_eq_bot]
      exact linear_map.ker_to_span_singleton (witt_vector.fraction_ring p k) V hx
    · rw [← linear_map.range_eq_top]
      rw [← (finrank_eq_one_iff_of_nonzero x hx).mp h_dim]
      rw [linear_map.span_singleton_eq_range]
  refine' ⟨⟨(linear_equiv.smul_of_ne_zero (witt_vector.fraction_ring p k) _ _ hb).trans F, _⟩⟩
  intro c
  rw [linear_equiv.trans_apply, linear_equiv.trans_apply, linear_equiv.smul_of_ne_zero_apply,
    linear_equiv.smul_of_ne_zero_apply, linear_equiv.map_smul, linear_equiv.map_smul]
  simp only [hax, linear_equiv.of_bijective_apply, linear_map.to_span_singleton_apply, linear_equiv.map_smulₛₗ,
    standard_one_dim_isocrystal.frobenius_apply, algebra.id.smul_eq_mul]
  simp only [← mul_smul]
  congr 1
  linear_combination (witt_vector.frobenius_ring_hom p k) c * hmb
#align isocrystal_classification isocrystal_classification
frobenius_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«exprΦ( , )» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `witt_vector.fraction_ring -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `witt_vector.frobenius_ring_hom -/
/-

@[simp]
theorem standard_one_dim_isocrystal.frobenius_apply (m : ℤ) (x : standard_one_dim_isocrystal p k m) :
    («exprΦ( , )» p k) x =
      «expr • » ((p : witt_vector.fraction_ring p k) ^ m) ((witt_vector.frobenius_ring_hom p k) x) :=
  rfl
#align standard_one_dim_isocrystal.frobenius_apply standard_one_dim_isocrystal.frobenius_apply
